headline: Commanders Rumors: Carson Wentz Viewed as More Than Bridge QB Ahead of 2022 NFL Draft
author: Erin Walsh
sentences: The Commanders reportedly view Carson Wentz as a long-term solution at quarterback instead of a "bridge player or even an experimental fix," according to Nicki Jhabvala of the Washington Post.

With the 2022 NFL draft right around the corner, several franchises could be looking to draft a quarterback for the future, including the Washington Commanders.
